data.eml:eml: Two new Neuratelia Rondani (Diptera, Mycetophilidae) species from Western Palaearctic: a case of limited congruence between morphology and DNA sequence data

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kurina, Olavi, Ounap, Erki, Poldmaa, Kadri (2015): Two new Neuratelia Rondani (Diptera, Mycetophilidae) species from Western Palaearctic: a case of limited congruence between morphology and DNA sequence data. ZooKeys 496: 105-129, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.496.9315, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.496.9315
